title: Left ankle rotation
description: Start with your left foot on your toes, hands on your waist.
1-4 rotate your foot clockwise.
5-8 rotate your foot counterclockwise (keep your feet on the floor).

title: Shoulder Press
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Press the weights upward until your arms are fully extended above your head.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height and repeat.

title: Windmill
description: Lean parallel to the floor and spread your arms to the sides, feet placed shoulder-width apart.
Squeezing your abs and obliques, rotate your body and touch the toes of the opposite foot with your fingers.

title: Bodyweight Squat
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, arms straight in front of you.
Lower your hips back and down as if sitting on a chair, keeping your chest up.
Push through your heels to return to standing position.

title: Bicep Curls
description: Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Keep your elbows close to your torso and curl the weights upward while contracting your biceps.
Lower the weights slowly back to the starting position.

title: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, hip-width apart.
Lift your hips toward the ceiling by squeezing your glutes.
Hold for a moment and slowly lower your hips back down.

title: Push-up
description: Place your hands on the floor, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower your chest toward the floor by bending your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position while keeping your body straight.

title: Plank Shoulder Tap
description: Start in a high plank position with your hands under your shoulders.
Tap your right hand to your left shoulder while keeping your hips stable.
Return to plank and repeat with the other side.

title: Tricep Dips
description: Sit on the edge of a bench or chair, hands next to your hips, fingers facing forward.
Slide your hips off the edge and lower your body by bending your elbows to about 90 degrees.
Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
